0.text: Innate - Echo: Seraphine basic abilities generate a stack of Echo, which stacks up to 2 times. At 2 stacks, Seraphine's next basic ability casts an additional time at no cost after a 0.033 seconds delay, consuming all Echo stacks after the cast time of the second cast.Seraphine gains maximum stacks of Echo when the game starts and upon respawning.

1.text: Innate - Harmony: Seraphine's ability casts grant a Note to herself and nearby allied  champions that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent Notes and stacks up to 4 times on each unit.

2.text: While any amount of Notes are active, Seraphine's basic attacks have an  uncancellable windup, gain  25 bonus attack range per Note, and fire all of them at the target, with each one dealing 4 / 8 / 14 / 24 (based on level) (+ 7% AP) magic damage, reduced by 75% for Notes from allies and increased by 200% against  minions.

0.text: Active: Seraphine hurls a soundwave to the target location that quickly expands in a radius upon arrival, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area,  increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health).

1.text: High Note will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Seraphine  shields herself and nearby allied champions for 2.5 seconds. She also gains 20% (+ 4% per 100 AP)  decaying bonus movement speed and grants allies 8% (+ 1.6% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed.

1.text: If Seraphine already had a  shield at the time of cast, Surround Sound will pulse after the duration,  healing herself and nearby allied champions, increased for each ally.

2.text: Surround Sound's effects can stack up to 2 times.

0.text: Active: Seraphine fires a heavy soundwave in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them by 99% for 1.25 seconds.

1.text: Enemies that are already  slowed are also  rooted for the same duration.

2.text: Enemies that are  immobilized or  grounded are also  stunned for the same duration.

0.text: Active: Seraphine projects a captivating force in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit,  revealing them while  charming and  slowing by 40% for a duration, increasing by 15% every 0.25 seconds over the duration up to 99%.

1.text: Encore's projectile resets its remaining travel distance whenever it hits an allied or enemy  champion, excluding Seraphine. Allied champions hit gain  4 Notes.

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+80 ability power
+20 ability haste
+600 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」

1.originHTML: +  +  1000

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+200 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.

Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

Active: Seraphine projects a captivating force in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit,  revealing them while  charming and  slowing by 40% for a duration, increasing by 15% every 0.25 seconds over the duration up to 99%.

Active: Seraphine projects a captivating force in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit,  revealing them while  charming and  slowing by 40% for a duration, increasing by 15% every 0.25 seconds over the duration up to 99%.

Active: Seraphine hurls a soundwave to the target location that quickly expands in a radius upon arrival, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area,  increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health).

Active: Seraphine  shields herself and nearby allied champions for 2.5 seconds. She also gains 20% (+ 4% per 100 AP)  decaying bonus movement speed and grants allies 8% (+ 1.6% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed.
